citations.desc: Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being.
citations.narrative:
A documented and veterinary approved environmental enhancement plan was not in place at the time of inspection.
Documentation ensures that the plan is in accordance with regulations and professional standards and covers social
grouping, environmental enhancement and any special needs. The facility must ensure that an environmental
enhancement plan is in place and utilized.
This is a (1st) Re-License Inspection for a Class “C”) license. The inspection and exit briefing were conducted with the
applicant.
All items must be in compliance within (1) more inspection(s) or by (01/01/2023 - 60 days counted from 1st RL Inspection)
or the applicant will forfeit the license fee and must wait 6 months to reapply. Please contact your inspector to schedule
your next Re-License Inspection.
Regulated activity can continue under your existing USDA license until it expires.
n

narrative:
3.154 
   
Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being. 
A documented and veterinary approved environmental enhancement plan was not in place at the time of inspection. 
Documentation ensures that the plan is in accordance with regulations and professional standards and covers social 
grouping, environmental enhancement and any special needs. The facility must ensure that an environmental 
enhancement plan is in place and utilized. 
 
This is a (1st) Re-License Inspection for a Class “C”) license. The inspection and exit briefing were conducted with the 
applicant. 
 
All items must be in compliance within (1) more inspection(s) or by (01/01/2023 - 60 days counted from 1st RL Inspection) 
or the applicant will forfeit the license fee and must wait 6 months to reapply. Please contact your inspector to schedule 
your next Re-License Inspection. 
 
Regulated activity can continue under your existing USDA license until it expires. 
 
 n
